body.p: Consequently, the IASB decided to replace the term ‘other than accidental offsetting’ with requirements that better conveyed its original notion:

li.p: an economic relationship between the hedged item and the hedging instrument, which gives rise to offset, must exist at inception and during the life of the hedging relationship; and
the effect of credit risk does not dominate the value changes that result from that economic relationship.
